Txt_Talk_PiratesBase_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_011.Text: *: The building up ahead there is the hideout of a gang of bloodthirsty pirate scoundrels. I'd stay away if I were you...

Txt_Talk_PiratesBase_B1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_011.Text: *: The pirates return at nightfall to count their spoils. You would do well not to be here then...
*: You seem able to handle yourself. Perhaps the pirates will not get the better of you.

Txt_Talk_PiratesBase_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0120.Text: *: Orbs, ye say? Arr, I've an inklin' we plundered somethin' of the sort from some unlucky soul a way back...
*: Now, if I could only get me grog-sodden bilge bucket of a brain to remember where we stowed it...
*: Well, I'll be jiggered! 'Tis the orb we plundered back aways! Are ye fixin' to keep our loot for yerself, ye wily dog?
*: 'Tain't worth more than a doubloon or two to us, shipmate. Ye're welcome to the dusty old bauble!
*: Arr, if ye're <IfSolo(a seafarin' soul,seafarin' souls)>, ye'll know that anythin' can happen out there on the ocean wave.

*: Why, ye could happen upon an uncharted island, or find <IfSolo(yerself,yerselves)> bow-to-bow with a Goddess-forsaken ghost ship.
Aye, anythin' at all...

Txt_Talk_PiratesBase_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0220.Text: *: And just who might you be, shipmate<IfSolo(,s)>? Arrr, so ye're the stout-hearted soul<IfSolo(,s)> we hear<IfSolo('s, are)> set to rid us of the Archfiend?
*: Ye're the talk of the seven seas! And we're behind ye all the way!
*: Aye, what's ours is yours! Make <IfSolo(yerself,yerselves)> at home, why don't ye! Arr, that's pirate hospitality for ye!
*: Ahoy there, shipmate<IfSolo(,s)>! I hear congratulations are in order! Beat the Archfiend, didn't ye, eh?
*: What's that, now? How did we grog-swillin' sea-dogs come to know such a thing?
*: Why, 'tis the talk of every town, village and den of rogues this side of Lozamii!

Txt_Talk_PiratesBase_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0320.Text: *: Don't look so afeared, young 'un! We only steals from them as deserves it! Gentlemen of honour, we are, and don't you forget it!
*: Arr, there be more evildoers out there deservin' of a piratical plunderin' than ye could ever imagine!

*: Why, ye can barely drop anchor without clonkin' some scoundrel square on the head!
We've work ahead of us yet, I'll wager!

Txt_Talk_PiratesBase_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0420.Text:
*: These be the cap'n's quarters.
Visitors by appointment only!

Txt_Talk_PiratesBase_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0520.Text: *: Not so long back, we sighted a ghost ship off the starboard bow... 'Twas a bone-chillin' sight to behold, ye may lay to that...

Txt_Talk_PiratesBase_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0620.Text: *: Keelhaul me here and now if that old boatman's bone didn't point us right towards a blasted ghost ship!
*: We soon offloaded the ill-omened object. Gave it to some crazed old hermit on an island way up north there...
*: The boss is a fine captain, and an even finer sailor, but I'd sooner take a lashin' from the cat than from that tongue o' hers!

Txt_Talk_PiratesBase_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0720.Text: *: Curse ye, ye miserly dog! Ye can do me a better price than that! Me own worst enemy could!
*: Plundered or not, a copper sword's worth more than seven measly gold coins! Damn yer penny-pinching eyes!
*: Five hundred, indeed! And for an iron lance the likes of which ye'll not see this side of the grave! Ye know full well it's worth twice that!
*: Arr, ye're not wrong there, shipmate.

Txt_Talk_PiratesBase_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0820.Text:
*: Sorry, we're busy talking...business.
Can you give us some privacy?
*: I'll give you five hundred for it. Not a penny more.

Txt_Talk_PiratesBase_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0920.Text: *: Ye're from Aliahan, ye say? Arr, 'tis a fine old place, and no mistake! Used to go there for me holidays, I did.

Txt_Talk_PiratesBase_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_1020.Text: Somethin' funny about a slip of a girl like me bein' boss of a gang of bloodthirsty sea dogs, is there, hm?
Not afraid to speak yer mind, are ye, shipmate? ....Haharrr! Ye're a brassy swab, so y'are<--->one after me own heart!
But tell me: did ye ever hear of an isle due south and a little west of these waters by the name of Lozamii?
Hahaharrr! Of course ye didn't! Not a soul save us pirates has heard of the accursed place!
Thought ye might like to know about it, you bein' on a journey to save the world and all... That is what ye're up to, ain't it?
Just sailin' for sailin's own sake, then, is it? 'Tis nice work, if ye can get it.
So it's true what the loose-tongued landlubbers're sayin'? Well, like as not, ye'll fail...
But if ye do manage to send the old Archfiend to the bottom, come back and I'll congratulate ye meself!
Garrr! Avast! Don't try and silver-tongue me, ye wily dog! I've no time for bootlickers!
I've heard the news, ye champion amongst men, ye! Ran the Archfiend through at last, did ye not? Bravo!
Ye're as tenacious as me own self, steadfast in the face of the countless men who swore I'd never be their equal!
Arr, the black spot to the lot of 'em! Muscle ain't the only way to win in this world, as you and I know only too well, friend!
Arr, we're a pair of kindred spirits, you and me. Will ye join me at the captain's table this fine evenin'?
I can't promise me manner won't get a little...coarse when I'm in me cups, but ye're more than equal to it. So, will ye join me?
Ye won't? Arr, and there I was lookin' forward to a night of drink, dance and devilry! Ye've wounded me deep, shipmate!
Ye will? But of course ye will! Yaharr! Well now, let's start as we mean to go on, shall we?
LISTEN UP, YE MANGY DOGS<--->TONIGHT'S A NIGHT FOR MERRYMAKIN'! BRING OUT THE GROG!
*: Aye, aye, Cap'n!
Ah, but don't be gettin' too excited now! Ye won't be havin' any<--->we'll get somethin' else to wet yer whistle!
Alright, it's time to make merry!
And so, {HERO} and the captain raised the roof until the wee small hours...
The fearsome lady pirate told of how she learned her trade at the hands of her even more fearsome pirate father...
And of how she took great pride in beating men at their own game...
She even had some advice for {HERO}...
...I've a regime, see. A way to stay sharp enough to carry on me father's fearsome legacy.
What I does is, every day, I makes sure to better a man at somethin'. I don't let womanhood come into it!
And I sense in ye the same fire, shipmate<--->the same determination not to let the faithless dogs beat ye! Am I right?
MORE GROG, CURSE YE! BRING MORE, YE MOTHERLESS WORMS!
Well now... Perhaps ye're not the {WORD} I took ye for...
...D'ye mean it? D'ye mean to follow the same path as me?
Ye do? Arr, that's music to me ears! Then from this day forth, be proud to call yerself a bodybuilder<--->no one'll mess with someone as strong as you!
I see, I see... Ye'll be gettin' the better of those dogs in yer own special way, I'll wager. Fair play to ye.
Ye're not thinkin' o' charmin' 'em into submission, are ye? I considered that meself once...
Hahaharrr! So it's the way of the vamp for ye, is it? Aye, they never suspect one until you strike, eh?
Well, so long as ye're doin' wat ye think is right, good luck to ye!
Heh... Ye're a sight craftier than ye look, shipmate...
No? Shame... I'd've paid good money to see ye wrap the poor blind fools round yer little finger...
Well, we must all walk our own road in life, I suppose... Harr! Listen to me! I must be in me cups already!
Is that so, now? And yet ye've come this far regardless? Now there's a thing. Ye're a special one indeed, shipmate...
That night, {HERO} and the captain talked and talked and talked...
And before they knew it, it was morning. So they went to bed, and slept until lunchtime!
Mornin', shipmate! I had me a fine old time yestreen thanks to yer good self! We must do that again soon!
May the wind always be in yer sails, {HERO}. I'm with ye all the way!
Ahoy there, {MOST_HEROIC}! How fares yer voyage through life, shipmate?
'Tis past time I broke open a barrel o' grog and we traded tales of our travels!

Txt_Talk_PiratesBase_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_1120.Text: *: Wouldn't bother headin' to Olivia's Promontory if I were you. No one can sail past it<--->they always get pushed back after hearin' some eery voice.
*: Still determined to go, eh? Well, it's north of Asham if ye really want to waste yer time.
*: You can only get there via the northern seas if ye're goin' by ship. Not an area you see too many landlubbers in, that's for sure.

Txt_Talk_PiratesBase_1F_SUB_0_VOLUME_121.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...

Txt_Talk_PiratesBase_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_1310.Text: *: Oh don't tell me my make-up's smudged now. After all that time I spent on it...
...and a monster is revealed before your eyes!
{LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...
Now you see me, now you don't!
